设函数  $f(x) = \begin{cases} x + 1, & x < 0 \\ 2, & x = 0 \\ \cos x, & x > 0 \end{cases}$ ，则  $\lim_{x\to 0}f(x)$
A. 等于1
B. 等于 2
C. 等于1或2
D. 不存在

已知  $\int f(x) dx = \tan x + C, \int g(x) dx = 2^x + C$ $C$  为任意常数，则下列等式正确的是
A.  $\int [f(x) + g(x)] dx = 2^x \tan x + C$
B.  $\int \frac{f(x)}{g(x)} dx = 2^{-x} + \tan x + C$
C.  $\int f[g(x)]dx = \tan (2^x) + C$
D.  $\int [f(x) + g(x)] dx = \tan x + 2^x + C$

下列级数收敛的是
A.  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} e^{\frac{1}{n}}$
B.  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)^{n}$
C.  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\frac{2}{3^n}-\frac{1}{n^3}\right)$
D.  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left[\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^{n} + \frac{1}{n}\right]$ .

微分方程  $y \, dx + x \, dy = 0$  满足初始条件的  $y \big|_{x=1} = 2$  特解为  $y =$

若二元函数  $z = f(x, y)$  的全微分  $dz = e^{x} \sin y \, dx + e^{x} \cos y \, dy$ ，则
$$
\frac {\partial^ {2} z}{\partial y \partial x} =
$$

已知  $\int_{1}^{t} f(x) dx = t \sin \frac{\pi}{t} (t > 1)$ ，则  $\int_{1}^{+\infty} f(x) dx =$
求  $\lim_{x\to 0}\frac{e^x - \sin x - 1}{x^2}$
设  $y = \frac{x^x}{2x + 1} (x > 0)$ ，求  $\frac{dy}{dx}$
求不定积分  $\int \frac{2 + x}{1 + x^2} dx$
计算定积分  $\int_{-\frac{1}{2}}^{0} x \sqrt{2x + 1} dx$
设  $x - z = e^{xyz}$ ，求  $\frac{\partial z}{\partial x}$  和  $\frac{\partial z}{\partial y}$
计算二重积分  $\iint_{D} \ln (x^{2} + y^{2}) d\sigma$ ，其中平面区域  $D = \{(x, y) | 1 \leq x^{2} + y^{2} \leq 4\}$
已知级数  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_n$  和  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} b_n$  满足  $0 \leq a_n \leq b_n$ , 且  $\frac{b_{n+1}}{b_n} = \frac{(n+1)^4}{3n^4 + 2n - 1}$ , 判定级数  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_n$  的收敛性
设函数  $f(x)$  满足  $\frac{df(x)}{de^{-x}} = x$ ，求曲线  $y = f(x)$  的凹凸区间

已知函数  $\varphi(x)$  满足  $\varphi(x) = 1 + x + \int_{0}^{x} t \varphi(t) dt + x \int_{x}^{0} \varphi(t) dt$
（1）求  $\varphi (x)$
(2) 求由曲线  $y = \varphi(x)$  和  $x = 0, x = \frac{\pi}{2}$  及  $y = 0$  围成的平面图形绕  $x$  轴旋转而成的立体的体积

（1）证明：  $f(x)$  在区间  $(0, +\infty)$  内单调减少；
（2）比较数值  $2018^{2019}$  与  $2019^{2018}$  的大小，并说明理由；

# 2019年广东省普通高校本科插班生招生考试
# 《高等数学》参考答案及评分标准
原式  $= \lim_{x \to 0} \frac{e^x - \cos x}{2x} = \lim_{x \to 0} \frac{e^x + \sin x}{2} = \frac{1}{2}$

解：
$$
\begin{array}{l} \because y = \frac {x ^ {x}}{2 x + 1} \\ \therefore \ln y = x \ln x - \ln (2 x + 1) \\ \therefore \frac {1}{y} y ^ {\prime} = \ln x + 1 - \frac {2}{2 x + 1} \\ \therefore \frac {d y}{d x} = (\ln x + 1 - \frac {2}{2 x + 1}) \frac {x ^ {x}}{2 x + 1} \\ \end{array}
$$

解：
$$
\begin{array}{l} \int \frac {2 + x}{1 + x ^ {2}} d x \\ = 2 \int \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} d x + \frac {1}{2} \int \frac {1}{1 + x ^ {2}} d \left(1 + x ^ {2}\right) \\ = 2 \arctan x + \frac {1}{2} \ln \left(1 + x ^ {2}\right) + C \\ \end{array}
$$

解：令  $\sqrt{2x + 1} = t$  ，则  $x = \frac{1}{2} t^2 -\frac{1}{2},dx = tdt$
$$
\begin{array}{l} \sqrt {2 x + 1} = t, x = \frac {1}{2} t ^ {2} - \frac {1}{2}, d x = t d t \\ \int_ {- \frac {1}{2}} ^ {0} x \sqrt {2 x + 1} d x = \int_ {0} ^ {1} t \left(\frac {1}{2} t ^ {2} - \frac {1}{2}\right) \cdot t d t \\ = \frac {1}{2} \int_ {0} ^ {1} \left(t ^ {4} - t ^ {2}\right) d t \\ = \frac {1}{2} \left(\frac {1}{5} t ^ {5} - \frac {1}{3} t ^ {3}\right) \Bigg | _ {0} ^ {1} \\ = - \frac {1}{1 5} \\ \end{array}
$$

解：设  $f(x,y,z) = x - z - e^{xyz}$
$$
\begin{array}{l} \therefore f _ {x} (x, y, z) = 1 - y z e ^ {x y z} \\ f _ {y} (x, y, z) = - x z e ^ {x y z} \\ f _ {z} (x, y, z) = - 1 - x y e ^ {x y z} \\ \therefore \frac {\partial z}{\partial x} = \frac {1 - y z e ^ {x y z}}{1 + x y e ^ {x y z}}, \frac {\partial z}{\partial y} = - \frac {x z e ^ {x y z}}{1 + x y e ^ {x y z}} \\ \end{array}
$$

解：由题意得  $1 \leq r \leq 2, 0 \leq \theta \leq \pi$
$$
\begin{array}{l} \therefore \iint_ {D} \ln (x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}) d \sigma = \\ = \int_ {0} ^ {2 \pi} (4 \ln 2 - \frac {3}{2}) d \theta \\ = (4 \ln 2 - \frac {3}{2}) \theta | _ {0} ^ {2 \pi} \\ = \pi (8 \ln 2 - 3) \\ \end{array}
$$

解：由题意得  $\frac{b_{n+1}}{b_n} = \frac{(n+1)^4}{3n^4 + 2n - 1}$ ,
$$
\therefore \lim  _ {x \rightarrow \infty} \frac {b _ {n + 1}}{b _ {n}} = \lim  _ {x \rightarrow \infty} \frac {(n + 1) ^ {4}}{3 n ^ {4} + 2 n - 1} = \frac {1}{3} <   1,
$$
由比值判别法可知  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} b_n$  收敛
$\because 0 \leq a_{n} \leq b_{n}$ , 由比较判别法可知  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_{n}$  也收敛

解
$$
\because \frac {d f (x)}{d e ^ {- x}} = x
$$
$$
\therefore d f (x) = x d e ^ {- x}
$$
$$
\therefore f ^ {\prime} (x) = - x e ^ {- x}
$$
$$
\therefore f ^ {\prime \prime} (x) = e ^ {- x} (x - 1)
$$
$\therefore f(x)$  的凹区间为  $(1, + \infty)$  ，凸区间为  $(- \infty ,1)$

（1）由题意得  $\varphi^{\prime}(x) = 1 + x\varphi (x) + \int_{x}^{0}\varphi (t)dt - x\varphi (x) = 1 + \int_{x}^{0}\varphi (t)dt$
$$
\begin{array}{l} \therefore \varphi^ {\prime \prime} (x) = - \varphi (x) \\ \therefore \varphi^ {\prime \prime} (x) + \varphi (x) = 0 \\ \end{array}
$$
特征方程  $r^2 + 1 = 0$  ，解得  $r = \pm i$
通解为  $\varphi (x) = \cos x + \sin x + C$
$$
\begin{array}{l} \because \varphi (0) = 1, \therefore C = 0 \\ \therefore \varphi (x) = \cos x + \sin x \\ \end{array}
$$
(2)由题意得
$$
\begin{array}{l} V _ {x} = \pi \int_ {0} ^ {\frac {\pi}{2}} (\cos x + \sin x) ^ {2} d x \\ = \pi \int_ {0} ^ {\frac {\pi}{2}} (1 + \sin 2 x) d x \\ = \pi (x - \frac {1}{2} \cos 2 x) \Bigg | _ {0} ^ {\frac {\pi}{2}} = \frac {\pi^ {2}}{2} + \pi \\ \end{array}
$$

证明（1）
$$
\begin{array}{l} \because f (x) = x \ln (1 + x) - (1 + x) \ln x \\ \therefore f ^ {\prime} (x) = \ln (1 + x) - \ln x + \frac {x}{1 + x} - \frac {1 + x}{x} \\ = \ln (1 + x) - \ln x - (\frac {1}{1 + x} + \frac {1}{x}) \\ \end{array}
$$
证明  $\ln (1 + x) - \ln x - \left(\frac{1}{1 + x} +\frac{1}{x}\right) < 0$  即可
即证  $\ln (1 + x) - \ln x < \left(\frac{1}{1 + x} +\frac{1}{x}\right)$
令  $g(x) = \ln x$
$\because g(x) = \ln x$  在  $(0, + \infty)$  连续可导，由拉格朗日中值定理得
$$
$$
$\therefore \ln (1 + x) - \ln x < \left(\frac{1}{1 + x} + \frac{1}{x}\right)$  成立
$$
\therefore \ln (1 + x) - \ln x - (\frac {1}{1 + x} + \frac {1}{x}) <   0
$$
$\therefore f(x)$  在  $(0, + \infty)$  单调递减
(2) 设  $a = 2019, b = 2018$  则  $a^{b} = 2019^{2018}, b^{a} = 2018^{2019}$ .
比较  $b^{a}, a^{b}$  即可，假设  $b^{a} > a^{b}$
即  $a\ln b > b\ln a$
即  $\frac{\ln b}{b} >\frac{\ln a}{a}$
设  $g(x) = \frac{\ln x}{x}$ ，则  $g'(x) = \frac{1 - \ln x}{x^2}$
$\because g(x)$  在  $(0, + \infty)$  单调递减即  $\therefore g(b) > g(a)$  即  $b^{a} > a^{b}$  成立
即  $2018^{2019} > 2019^{2018}$
